name: Hospital
description: Healthcare facility providing inpatient outpatient emergency and surgical services
obligations: Comply with all HIPAA Privacy Security Breach Notification and Enforcement Rules, implement safeguards protect PHI rights management
covered_if_criteria: Transmits health information in electronic form

name: Physician Practice
description: Medical office providing diagnostic treatment and consultation services
obligations: Maintain PHI privacy implement security measures conduct risk assessments, train workforce

name: Dental Practice
description: Dentistry office providing preventive restorative and surgical dental services
obligations: Implement HIPAA privacy security and breach notification requirements, document policies

name: Health Insurance Company
description: Organization providing health insurance coverage and claims processing
obligations: Manage PHI securely notify of breaches, maintain records respond to individual requests

name: HMO
description: Health Maintenance Organization providing managed care coverage
obligations: Implement administrative technical physical safeguards, maintain breach log

name: Medical Billing Service
description: Organization that converts health information to standard format for transmission
obligations: Translate health information standards, maintain data integrity, document process
covered_if_criteria: Converts health information to standard format

name: Claims Processor
description: Entity processing insurance claims and coordinating benefits
obligations: Handle PHI securely, notify individuals of breaches, respond to HIPAA requests

name: Nursing Home
description: Long-term care facility providing residential healthcare services
obligations: Implement all safeguards, train staff, document security measures

name: Home Health Agency
description: Agency providing healthcare services in patient homes
obligations: Safeguard portable PHI, implement field worker training, secure home visits

name: Pharmacy Benefit Manager
description: Organization managing prescription drug benefits and claims
obligations: Maintain pharmacy PHI securely, implement safeguards, coordinate with insurers
covered_if_criteria: Handles electronic prescription and claims data
